column4: GM to test Cisco technology for sharing road safety spectrum
column5: WASHINGTON General Motors Co plans to begin testing new Cisco Systems Inc technology that could allow "talking" cars to share radio communication bands with roadside Wi-Fi devices  a GM executive told U.S. lawmakers.

column4: GM to test Cisco technology for sharing road safety spectrum
column5: WASHINGTON  June 24 General Motors Co  plans to begin testing new Cisco Systems Inc technology that could allow "talking" cars to share radio communication bands with roadside Wi-Fi devices  a GM executive told U.S. lawmakers.
